original_query.title: fox jumps above animal
original_query.description: What pangrams have a fox jumping above some animal?
original_query.narrative: Relevant pangrams have a fox jumping over an animal (e.g., an dog). Pangrams containing a fox that is not jumping or jumps over something that is not an animal are not relevant.

original_query.title: multiple animals including a zebra
original_query.description: Which pangrams have multiple animals where one of the animals is a zebra?
original_query.narrative: Relevant pangrams have at least two animals, one of the animals must be a Zebra. Pangrams containing only a Zebra are not relevant.
